summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by removing the CultLineSection image rendering and leaving only heading/subtext. REQ-2 is not evidenced in the diff: no removal of the referenced image path string and no deletion of the asset file is shown. Two auxiliary/metadata files were modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the unused static asset reference to "/assets/generated/karm-whatsapp-card.dim_736x1472.jpg" from the codebase, and delete the file from the frontend public assets if it is no longer used anywhere in the app.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no code change removing the string reference and no file removal under frontend/public/assets/generated/. Only CultLineSection.tsx and metadata/summary files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added metadata entries describing many landing-page components and changes (frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to remove an image from CultLineSection and remove a specific asset reference/file; it does not request regenerating or editing repository-wide summary documentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json by adding new_feature_requests entries (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3) and setting statuses.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to project tracking/state files; this is extra beyond the specified frontend changes.
